scripts.generate-report: mkdir -p cypress/reports/mochareports && marge cypress/reports/mochareports/report.json -f report -o cypress/reports/mochareports --inline
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test: npm run cy:run:chrome -- --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*' --config excludeSpecPattern='**/a11y/**/*' || npm run posttest
scripts.test:a11y: npm run cy:run:chrome -- --spec 'cypress/e2e/a11y/**/*' || npm run posttest
